TEI.2.document_title: Ramon Musquiz to Stephen F Austin, 03-06-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Ramon Musquiz to Austin, March 6, 1828. Instructing Austin to make a change in formal report of local election. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 24
